item.name: Detect provider based on given email address

request.description:
Use this endpoint to detect which provider an email uses. If we are able to detect the provider, we'll return`detected:true`. If we are not able to determine the provider, we'll return`detected:false`.

If`detected:false`, then it's either IMAP or Microsoft Exchange Server. You can also ignore`is_imap`if`detected:false`. Use the results to determine the provider to pass into the settings object for[native authentication](https://developer.nylas.com/docs/api/#post/connect/authorize).
